description:
The first trailer for the new season of "Shameless" has arrived, so rejoice. Did you get all of that rejoicing out of the way? Alright, now turn up the anger because it's missing the one thing anyone really wanted to see.《无耻之徒》第五季首支预告片来了，在开心之余大家似乎发现少了些什么？因为在这则预告片里有一个大家一直在期待的角色没有出现。

Where's Jimmy-Steve? You know he's alive, you know he's back in the picture, but Fiona's former love is nowhere to see seen. Well, nowhere to be seen by you, anyway. Jimmy-Steve去哪了？我们知道他还活着，也看到了他拍摄第五季的照片，但是Fiona的这位前男友没有出现在预告片中。

The Gallaghers seem busy, with an organic coffee shop moving in and cramping their style. They're always up to some kind of trouble and the world needs a peek at Jimmy-Steve.在预告片中Gallagher一家很忙，一家咖啡店的出现让这一家子有些不适应。不过这种混乱对这个家庭来说简直是小菜一碟，所有人都还是想看到Jimmy-Steve的出现。

"Shameless" returns Jan. 11 on Showtime.

title: 《无耻之徒》第五季首支预告片发布
